title: Ajax: Rebel Initiate/Ajax: Anarchist Extreme
stripped_title: Ajax Rebel Initiate Ajax Anarchist Extreme
stripped_text:
Front: Ajax: Rebel Initiate
Identity: Natrual

When you are flatlined on your turn, flip this identity instead of losing the game. The Corp trashes the top X cards of R&D. X is equal to the amount of damage you have suffered this turn.

Back: Ajax: Anarchist Extreme
Identity: Inhuman

Your maximum hand size is 0 (this cannot be increased, or decreased)

:interrupt: -> If you would be flatlined on your turn, you may trash the top card of your stack and lose any remainng clicks instead of losing the game.
text:
Front: Ajax: Rebel Initiate
Identity: Natrual

When you are flatlined on your turn, flip this identity instead of losing the game. The Corp trashes the top X cards of R&D. X is equal to the amount of damage you have suffered this turn.

Back: Ajax: Anarchist Extreme
Identity: Inhuman

Your maximum hand size is 0 (this cannot be increased, or decreased)

:interrupt: -> If you would be flatlined on your turn, you may trash the top card of your stack and lose any remainng clicks instead of losing the game.

title: Ashes of an Empire
stripped_text:
You may play this event from your heap.

After you resolve this event, end your action phase.

Make a run. When that run ends, forfeit each agenda stolen during the run and trash the top x cards of R&D where x is equal to the number of agenda points forfeited this way. If any agendas are forfeited this way the Corp must forfeit their next turn.

Remove this event from the game.
text:
You may play this event from your heap.

After you resolve this event, end your action phase.

Make a run. When that run ends, forfeit each agenda stolen during the run and trash the top x cards of R&D where x is equal to the number of agenda points forfeited this way. If any agendas are forfeited this way the Corp must forfeit their next turn.

Remove this event from the game.

title: Ran Somewhere ATK
stripped_text:
When you install this program place 5 virus counters on it.

Instead of breaching a remote server, if this is not already hosted in a server, you may host this program in the root of the attacked server.

All corp cards in the root of a server hosting this program lose all abilities.

The corp cannot install, rez, score, trash, or advance its cards in or protecting a server hosting this.

0{c}: Purge viruses counters. The corp loses 1{c} for each virus counter removed this way. Trash this Program. Only the corp can use this ability, and only while Ran Somewhere ATK is hosted in a server.
text:
When you install this program place 5 virus counters on it.

Instead of breaching a remote server, if this is not already hosted in a server, you may host this program in the root of the attacked server.

All corp cards in the root of a server hosting this program lose all abilities.

The corp cannot install, rez, score, trash, or advance its cards in or protecting a server hosting this.

0{c}: Purge viruses counters. The corp loses 1{c} for each virus counter removed this way. Trash this Program. Only the corp can use this ability, and only while Ran Somewhere ATK is hosted in a server.

title: Rogue Network
stripped_text:
Limit 1 hosted tag

When you take a tag, you may host it on this resource. *(the tag is not active)*

**{trash}:** Take a tag. You can only use this ability while there is a tag hosted on this resource.

You may remove hosted tags as if they were yours.

The Corp may trash this resource through the basic action while it’s hosting a tag .
text:
Limit 1 hosted tag

When you take a tag, you may host it on this resource. *(the tag is not active)*

**{trash}:** Take a tag. You can only use this ability while there is a tag hosted on this resource.

You may remove hosted tags as if they were yours.

The Corp may trash this resource through the basic action while it’s hosting a tag .

title: Dave Demolitions Expert/Dave New Angeles Most Wanted
stripped_title: Dave Demolitions Expert Dave New Angeles Most Wanted
stripped_text:
Front Side: Dave: Demolitions Expert
Identity: Natural

When your turn ends, if you've made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn: flip this identity, and trash all installed corp and runner cards.

"The bigger they are..."


Back Side: Dave: New Angeles Most Wanted

Identity: Felon

"... the harder they fall"
text:
Front Side: Dave: Demolitions Expert
Identity: Natural

When your turn ends, if you've made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn: flip this identity, and trash all installed corp and runner cards.

"The bigger they are..."


Back Side: Dave: New Angeles Most Wanted

Identity: Felon

"... the harder they fall"
flavor:
Front: \"The bigger they are...\"

Back: \"... the harder they fall\"

title: Gear Shift
stripped_text:
Play only as your first click.

Set the cards in your Grip aside. *(they are in no zone)*

Draw 4 cards.

When your discard phase ends, shuffle your Grip into your Stack, adding the set aside cards back to your Grip.
text:
Play only as your first click.

Set the cards in your Grip aside. *(they are in no zone)*

Draw 4 cards.

When your discard phase ends, shuffle your Grip into your Stack, adding the set aside cards back to your Grip.

title: Turtles
stripped_text:
+1 MU

Whenever you make a successful run, you may either reveal a copy of Turtles from your Grip and host it on this Hardware or shuffle a hosted copy of Turtles into your stack to draw 2 cards.

Limit 1 **console** per player

Limit 6 per deck.
text:
+1 MU

Whenever you make a successful run, you may either reveal a copy of Turtles from your Grip and host it on this Hardware or shuffle a hosted copy of Turtles into your stack to draw 2 cards.

Limit 1 **console** per player

Limit 6 per deck.

title: Light the Way
stripped_text:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server. 

The first time a run ends on the chosen server, you may initiate a new run on that server ignoring any additional costs.
text:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server. 

The first time a run ends on the chosen server, you may initiate a new run on that server ignoring any additional costs.

title: Katelin: Perfected Design
stripped_text:
Your maximum hand size is equal to your unused MU.

Effects that would increase, or decrease your maximum hand size affect your memory limit instead.
text:
Your maximum hand size is equal to your unused MU.

Effects that would increase, or decrease your maximum hand size affect your memory limit instead.

title: Efficiency Chip
stripped_text:
:interrupt: -> While you are searching your Stack for a program, you may reveal this from your Stack and added it to your Grip. Use the ability of only one copy of Efficiency Chip in this way per turn.

Install Efficiency Chip on a program. Lower that programs MU cost by 1. (minimum 0)
text:
:interrupt: -> While you are searching your Stack for a program, you may reveal this from your Stack and added it to your Grip. Use the ability of only one copy of Efficiency Chip in this way per turn.

Install Efficiency Chip on a program. Lower that programs MU cost by 1. (minimum 0)

title: Power Relay
stripped_text: The first time you charge 1 of your installed cards each turn, you may charge another of your installed cards that hasn’t been charged this turn. *(Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)*
text: The first time you charge 1 of your installed cards each turn, you may charge another of your installed cards that hasn’t been charged this turn. *(Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)*

title: Bloodhound
stripped_text:
When you install this program, and when your turn begins, you may name a card. This program can only interface with ice matching the last name you chose this way.

Interface -> 1{c}: Break ice subroutine.

1{c}: +2 strength.
text:
When you install this program, and when your turn begins, you may name a card. This program can only interface with ice matching the last name you chose this way.

Interface -> 1{c}: Break ice subroutine.

1{c}: +2 strength.

title: Fetch
stripped_text:
**During deck construction:** Choose any number of unique cards to be part of your **Stash**. Their influence costs and limits per deck are factored into deck building. The **Stash** costs an additional 1 influence per card in it.

Add a card from your **Stash** to your Grip.
text:
**During deck construction:** Choose any number of unique cards to be part of your **Stash**. Their influence costs and limits per deck are factored into deck building. The **Stash** costs an additional 1 influence per card in it.

Add a card from your **Stash** to your Grip.

title: Ali-ción Labs: Efficiency’s Finest
stripped_text: **{click}{click}{click}:** Play a non-terminal operation twice, if possible, ignoring any other {click} costs when paying its cost. *(stays in the play area thoughout, unless another effect would change its zone)*
text: **{click}{click}{click}:** Play a non-terminal operation twice, if possible, ignoring any other {click} costs when paying its cost. *(stays in the play area thoughout, unless another effect would change its zone)*

title: Brasília Defense System
stripped_text:
When you rez this ice during a run on this server, you may pay 1{c} to trash one installed non-icebreaker Runner card with a {trash} ability.

When the runner approaches this ice you may rerez it. *(derez, and then rez this piece of ice paying all costs)*

{sub} end the run unless the runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
text:
When you rez this ice during a run on this server, you may pay 1{c} to trash one installed non-icebreaker Runner card with a {trash} ability.

When the runner approaches this ice you may rerez it. *(derez, and then rez this piece of ice paying all costs)*

{sub} end the run unless the runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.

title: Muriel 3.0
stripped_text:
Lose {click}{click}{click}: Break up to 3 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability.

{sub} The Corp gets +1 allotted {click} for their next turn.
{sub} Gain 1{c}
{sub} You may draw one card, and/or shuffle one card from Archives or HQ into R&D.
{sub} end the run
text:
Lose {click}{click}{click}: Break up to 3 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability.

{sub} The Corp gets +1 allotted {click} for their next turn.
{sub} Gain 1{c}
{sub} You may draw one card, and/or shuffle one card from Archives or HQ into R&D.
{sub} end the run

title: Corporate Efficiency Zone
stripped_text:
When your turn begins you may choose another card in the root of this server to resolve its beginning of turn triggers an additional time.

Limit 1 region per server.
text:
When your turn begins you may choose another card in the root of this server to resolve its beginning of turn triggers an additional time.

Limit 1 region per server.

title: Takamanohara: Shaping Reality
stripped_text:
You draw a starting hand of 4 cards.

**Before your first turn begins:** Search R&D for 2 cards, add them to HQ, then choose 1 card from HQ to shuffle into R&D.
text:
You draw a starting hand of 4 cards.

**Before your first turn begins:** Search R&D for 2 cards, add them to HQ, then choose 1 card from HQ to shuffle into R&D.

title: Nope
stripped_text: Threat 3 -> You can score this during any paid ability window. (including on the runner’s turn)
text: Threat 3 -> You can score this during any paid ability window. (including on the runner’s turn)

title: Blattodea Genomics
stripped_text:
You can advance this asset.

The trash cost of all cards is increased by 1 per advancement counter on this asset.
text:
You can advance this asset.

The trash cost of all cards is increased by 1 per advancement counter on this asset.

title: Coercion
stripped_text:
Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.

After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.

Choose a server. The Runner’s first {click} on their next turn must be spent to take the basic action to run that server. They cannot jack out during that run.
text:
Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.

After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.

Choose a server. The Runner’s first {click} on their next turn must be spent to take the basic action to run that server. They cannot jack out during that run.

title: NBN: Curated Content
stripped_text:
You can look at the top card of R&D anytime.

1{c}: swap the top 2 cards of R&D.

3{c}: draw 1 card. Use this ability only once per turn.
text:
You can look at the top card of R&D anytime.

1{c}: swap the top 2 cards of R&D.

3{c}: draw 1 card. Use this ability only once per turn.

title: Project Astro
stripped_text:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3

**Hosted agenda counter:** Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
text:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3

**Hosted agenda counter:** Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.

title: Superposition
stripped_text: :interrupt: -> When you would score this agenda, you may search R&D for an agenda with an advancement requirement equal to or less than 4. If you do, score that agenda instead and shuffle Super Position into R&D.
text: :interrupt: -> When you would score this agenda, you may search R&D for an agenda with an advancement requirement equal to or less than 4. If you do, score that agenda instead and shuffle Super Position into R&D.

title: Investment Fund
stripped_text: When your turn begins you may remove Investment Fund from the game, to shuffle 2 copies of Dividends into R&D, gain 1{c}, and draw 2 cards.
text: When your turn begins you may remove Investment Fund from the game, to shuffle 2 copies of Dividends into R&D, gain 1{c}, and draw 2 cards.

title: Dividends
stripped_text:
Gain 2{c}, {click}, and draw 1 card.

Remove this operation from the game.

Can’t be included within deck building.
text:
Gain 2{c}, {click}, and draw 1 card.

Remove this operation from the game.

Can’t be included within deck building.

title: Weyland Consortium: Building the Bedrock
stripped_text: You start the game with 3 unique Kernel cards installed
text: You start the game with 3 unique Kernel cards installed

title: Archives Kernel
stripped_text:
Install only on Archives 

{sub} you may add one card from archives to HQ or shuffle it into R&D.

**Remove this Ice from the game:** Shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D.

Can't be included within deck building
text:
Install only on Archives 

{sub} you may add one card from archives to HQ or shuffle it into R&D.

**Remove this Ice from the game:** Shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D.

Can't be included within deck building

title: R&D Kernel
stripped_text:
Install only on R&D

When the runner encounters  this ice, you may look at the top card of R&D

{sub} you may draw one card

{trash} shuffle R&D

Can't be included within deck building
text:

When the runner encounters  this ice, you may look at the top card of R&D

title: HQ Kernel
stripped_text:
Install only on HQ

{sub} gain 1{c} and end the run

{trash} The runner may spend {click}, otherwise the run cannot be declared successful. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

Can't be included within deck building
text:

{sub} gain 1{c} and end the run

title: Public Intimidation
stripped_text:
The first time you take a bad publicity each turn, do 2 meat damage if this server is not protected by ice.

When the runner trashes this asset from anywhere, they must suffer 2 meat damage, unless they remove a bad publicity.
text:
The first time you take a bad publicity each turn, do 2 meat damage if this server is not protected by ice.

When the runner trashes this asset from anywhere, they must suffer 2 meat damage, unless they remove a bad publicity.

title: Corporate Loan
stripped_text:
Gain 6{c}

When your turn begins, if this card is face up in Archives, remove it from the game, and lose 3{c}.
text:
Gain 6{c}

When your turn begins, if this card is face up in Archives, remove it from the game, and lose 3{c}.

title: Subdivision
stripped_text:
Install only on HQ.

When you rez Subdivision choose another identity from the same faction, and host it on Subdivision. Remove hosted identity from the game when Subdivision in uninstalled, or derezed.

Hosted identity text is active.

When the runner would breach HQ, they may instead access this upgrade. If they chose not to, they cannot access this upgrade during the breach.

Limit 1 per deck.
text:
Install only on HQ.

When you rez Subdivision choose another identity from the same faction, and host it on Subdivision. Remove hosted identity from the game when Subdivision in uninstalled, or derezed.

Hosted identity text is active.

When the runner would breach HQ, they may instead access this upgrade. If they chose not to, they cannot access this upgrade during the breach.

Limit 1 per deck.

title: Change in Leadership
stripped_text:
:interrupt: -> When you would mulligan, you may reveal this card from HQ and set it aside. Draw one fewer card when you mulligan. Then, return this card to HQ.

Draw 2 cards. Shuffle 2 cards from HQ into R&D. Gain {click}.
text:
:interrupt: -> When you would mulligan, you may reveal this card from HQ and set it aside. Draw one fewer card when you mulligan. Then, return this card to HQ.

Draw 2 cards. Shuffle 2 cards from HQ into R&D. Gain {click}.
flavor: I promise I can turn this ship around, or I'll throw myself overboard.

title: 40YCR Chip
stripped_text: :trash:: Run any server. The Corp may pay 5{c} to prevent this. Use this ability only in the paid ability window immediately after someone finishes taking an action
